entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bécancour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
